member.name: T:ChartKit.SkiaSharpView.BoxSeries`1
member.summary: Defines a box serries series in the user interface.
member.typeparam: The type of the points, you can use any type, the library already knows how to handle the most common numeric types, to use a custom type, you must register the type globally () or at the series level ().

member.name: F:ChartKit.SkiaSharpView.Drawing.Geometries.SVGPathGeometry.Cache
member.summary: Svg paths are cached in this dictionary to prevent parsing multiple times the same path, when you use the class, keep in mind that the parsed paths are living in memory, this has no secondary effects in most of the cases, but if you are parsing a lot of paths (maybe over 500) then you must consider cleaning the cache when you no longer need a path.

member.name: M:ChartKit.SkiaSharpView.Extensions.GaugeGenerator.BuildSolidGauge(ChartKit.SkiaSharpView.Extensions.GaugeItem[])
member.summary: Builds a solid Gauge, it generates a series collectio of , these series are ready to be plotted in a pie chart, and will render the gauge, this reuses all the power and functionality of the class.
member.returns: A series collection of pie seires.

member.returns: A series collection of pie seires.

member.summary: Defines a set of geometries that will be painted using a linear gradient shader.

member.summary: Default start point.

member.summary: Default end point.

member.name: M:ChartKit.SkiaSharpView.Painting.LinearGradientPaint.#ctor(SkiaSharp.SKColor[],SkiaSharp.SKPoint,SkiaSharp.SKPoint,System.Single[],SkiaSharp.SKShaderTileMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The start point, both X and Y in the range of 0 to 1, where 0 is the start of the axis and 1 the end.
The end point, both X and Y in the range of 0 to 1, where 0 is the start of the axis and 1 the end.
An array of integers in the range of 0 to 1. These integers indicate the relative positions of the colors, You can set that argument to null to equally space the colors, default is null.
The shader tile mode, default is .

member.name: T:ChartKit.SkiaSharpView.Painting.RadialGradientPaint
member.summary: Defines a set of geometries that will be painted using a radial gradient shader.

member.name: M:ChartKit.SkiaSharpView.Painting.RadialGradientPaint.#ctor(SkiaSharp.SKColor[],System.Nullable{SkiaSharp.SKPoint},System.Single,System.Single[],SkiaSharp.SKShaderTileMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The center point of the gradient, both X and Y in the range of 0 to 1, where 0 is the start of the axis and 1 the end, default is (0.5, 0.5).
The radius, in the range of 0 to 1, where 1 is the minimum of both Width and Height of the chart, default is 0.5.
An array of integers in the range of 0 to 1. These integers indicate the relative positions of the colors, You can set that argument to null to equally space the colors, default is null.
The shader tile mode, default is .
